## ElementCSSBoxDimensions.scrollBox property

A box formed by `scrollWidth` and `scrollHeight` element properties.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scrollBox: CSSBox;
```

## Remarks

The box is formed with all the space occupied by element's children, even when overflowing. The element padding, border and scrollbar are not counted. See [https://drafts.csswg.org/cssom-view/\#dom-element-scrollwidth](https://drafts.csswg.org/cssom-view/#dom-element-scrollwidth)<!-- -->, `scrollWidth` and `scrollHeight` for a reference.
